title: (x) "Grappling Submission" square sci-fi display face - Electric Toaster {Mike Rohde (self)}
content:
I have a font I need to match to recreate some artwork -- it's a sans serif, kinda funky sci-fi looking font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140628052739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/funky-font-sample_5623.jpg)

Been looking and have not yet found this one — can anyone name the font? :-)

Thanks in advance!

Mike
author: rohdesign

comments.content:
Check Dafont's techno section. This looks free to me.

- Lex

Not an exact match, but in a similar vein:

[http://ms-studio.com/FontSales/changeling.html#](http://web.archive.org/web/20140628052739/http:/ms-studio.com/FontSales/changeling.html# "http://ms-studio.com/FontSales/changeling.html#")

Lee, you were right — it was Electric Toaster on DaFont:

[http://www.dafont.com/electric-toaster.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140628052739/http:/www.dafont.com/electric-toaster.font "http://www.dafont.com/electric-toaster.font")

Thanks for the pointers guys! :-)
